title: Dreamfall Chapters: Books I-III (Selective Download) - FitGirl
description:
Dreamfall Chapters: Books I-III (v3.0.3, MULTI3) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless, Selective Download 3.9~4.8 GB]


::Information::


Release Date: I - October 21, 2014; II - March 12, 2015; III - June 26, 2015
Genres/Tags: Adventure, Third-person, 3D
Developer: Red Thread Games
Publisher: Red Thread Games
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Unity
Steam User Rating: 85% of user reviews are positive (based on 920 reviews)

Interface Language: English, German, French
Audio Language: English, German
Crack: built-in (CPY)


::Repack Features::


Based on Dreamfall_Chapters_Book_Three_Realms-FLT ISO release: flt-drbt.iso (9,766,436,864 bytes)
The following updates were installed: Dreamfall.Chapters.Book.Three.Realms.UPDATE.3.0.1-CPY (2.5 GB) & Dreamfall.Chapters.Update.9-FTS [v3.0.3] (90 MB)
Three released chapters of five planned included: Book I, II & III
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 9 to 3,9~4.8 GB)
German voiceovers can be skipped on downloading, if you don't need German speech in the game
Bonus content (Europolis tourist map, Soundtrack, The Art of Book One & Wallpapers) can be skipped as well, if you don't need it
Installation takes 7-10 minutes (depending on your system)
HDD space after installation: up to 10 GB
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
Repack by FitGirl
